indicator_name: Number of Universities registered in AISHE 2021-22
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: In survey year 2021-22, a total of 1,168 Universities were registered on the AISHE Portal.
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count of Universities registered on AISHE portal
coverage_notes_or_limitations_verbatim: Response includes pooled data from previous years

indicator_name: Response rate of Universities in AISHE 2021-22
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: The response (including pooling) in the Survey is 99.5%.
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Responding Universities divided by registered Universities
coverage_notes_or_limitations_verbatim: Includes pooled responses from AISHE 2019-20 and 2020-21

indicator_name: Number of Colleges registered under AISHE
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: There are 45,473 Colleges registered under AISHE belonging to the 328 Universities (affiliating).
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count of Colleges registered under affiliating Universities
universe_population_covered: Colleges affiliated to Central and State Public Universities
coverage_notes_or_limitations_verbatim: Only affiliated and constituent colleges of public universities counted

exact_indicator_text_verbatim: College Density i.e., the number of colleges per lakh eligible population (population in the age-group 18-23 years) at All India Level is 30.
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Number of colleges per lakh population aged 18–23 years
collection_method: Computed from AISHE and population data
coverage_notes_or_limitations_verbatim: Population projections based on Census methodology
table_title_verbatim: Number of College per Lakh Population (18-23 YEARS)

indicator_name: Total estimated student enrolment in Higher Education
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: The total estimated enrolment in Higher Education Institutions is 4,32,68,181
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Estimated count of students enrolled in Higher Education Institutions
universe_population_covered: Students enrolled in Higher Education Institutions

indicator_name: Female student enrolment in Higher Education
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: The total female enrolment is 2,06,91,792
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count of female students enrolled in Higher Education Institutions

exact_indicator_text_verbatim: Total estimated SC student enrolment is 66,22,923 which is 15.3% of the total enrolment.
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count and percentage of SC students out of total enrolment
table_title_verbatim: State-wise Estimated Enrolment for different social groups

exact_indicator_text_verbatim: ST student enrolment is 27,10,678 which is 6.3 % of the total enrolment
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count and percentage of ST students out of total enrolment
table_title_verbatim: State-wise Estimated Enrolment for different social groups

exact_indicator_text_verbatim: Out of total estimated enrolment, 30,13,192 students belong to Minority Community
The total number of Foreign Nationals/students enrolled in India is 46,878
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count of foreign students enrolled in Indian HEIs

indicator_name: Gross Enrolment Ratio in Higher Education (18–23 years)
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: In the year 2021-22, Gross Enrolment Ratio (GER) in higher education for age group 18-23 years has increased to 28.4
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Total enrolment in higher education divided by population in age group 18–23 years
collection_method: AISHE estimation based on Census projections
document_section: 2.3 Gross enrolment ratio in Higher Education (18-23 years)
table_title_verbatim: Gross Enrolment Ratio in Higher Education (18-23 Years)

indicator_name: Gender Parity Index in Higher Education (18–23 years)
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: Gender Parity Index (GPI) in Higher Education (18-23 Years)
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Female GER divided by Male GER
table_title_verbatim: Gender Parity Index in Higher Education (18-23 Years)

indicator_name: Total number of teachers in Higher Education
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: The total number of faculty/teachers in 2021-22 are 15.98 lakh
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count of teachers/faculty in Higher Education Institutions
disaggregations: Gender, Social Group, Post, Institution Type

indicator_name: Pupil Teacher Ratio in Higher Education
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: For Regular Mode, Pupil Teacher Ratio (PTR) in Universities and Colleges is 24
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Number of students divided by number of teachers
universe_population_covered: Students and teachers in regular mode
table_title_verbatim: Pupil Teacher Ratio (PTR) in Higher Education

indicator_name: Total number of pass-outs in Higher Education
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: The total number of pass-outs has increased to 1.07 Crore in 2021-22
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Count of students who passed out/awarded degree
disaggregations: Level, Programme, Discipline, Gender, Social Group

indicator_name: Availability of infrastructure facilities in Institutions
exact_indicator_text_verbatim: Percentage of Institutions having various Infrastructure
definition_numerator_denominator_verbati: Institutions with specified infrastructure divided by total responding institutions
